reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress beautiful and well-made, with sleeves and bottom lengths that are perfect, and one customer notes it works well with ankle boots.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty dress for family pictures!
items.body: I loved this dress! I ordered it for family pictures, and it came in 30 minutes before we had to leave. I put it on, and I was so happy! It was such good quality, and comfortable! I think it photographed nicely, too! I'd say it runs true to size. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress, nice fabric and fit!
items.body: This dress is great. This is nice weight material, not the thin flimsy fabric! The belt included, or a belt you already have makes it fit perfectly. I am 5 Ft 8 in. and it is a good length as well. Read more
items.author: BP

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous!
items.body: Love the material. The fit is great! It’s gorgeous I got an XL. I’m 5’8, 215lbs. Little bit of gapping in the chest area, but can fix with some fabric tape Read more
items.author: Shoppingshell

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and classy
items.body: This dress is beautiful and flattering. The only issue was that the seams have too much fabric which makes it itchy, wearing a cami under helped Read more
items.author: Shira

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Small in the bust
items.body: The dress looked like a little house on the prairie dress on me and my breast did not fit inside of the size I purchased. I’m a 36 DDD and I usually fit in a medium Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress but with some issues
items.body: I love the color and the material used to construct this dress. The button holes are a little to small making it difficult to unbutton and button. Two buttons fell off when I was trying to unbutton the dress. It would be helpful if either the thread was more durable or more stitches were used when sewing them on the dress. Read more
items.author: Michelle Stanford

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful!
items.body: This is a perfect Christmas dress! It hogs in all the right places and it is very flattering. I bought a small. I am 5 ft 1 and 135 lbs. I have a pear shaped body. The dress is super comfortable and the fabric is thick enough to be great for colder months, but breathable enough for warmer months. I put a bit of a petticoat under it to add fullness. It fits perfectly and I love it. It washes great. I don’t dry it, but it does come out slightly wrinkled, so I suggest a light ironing job. Read more
items.author: Leftysrule

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Fabric is NOT it
items.body: This dress is SO cute and really flattering. However the fabric made me SO itchy and uncomfortable I needed to get it off of my body! Read more
items.author: Catherine Walley

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blue, Grey Blue, Army Green, Black, Dark Green, Red, Navy, Wine Red, Khaki, Pink, White, Bean Green, Beige, Purple. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
